alert.note: Alert for Howard; Montgomery; Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:28PM EDT until September 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HOWARD...SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY AND NORTHERN PRINCE GEORGES COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Bethesda, or near Bethesda, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Rockville, Bethesda, Olney, Aspen Hill, Potomac, North Bethesda, Fairland, White Oak, Redland, Colesville, Kemp Mill, Chevy Chase, North Kensington, South Kensington, Forest Glen, Martin`s Additions, North Chevy Chase, Wheaton-Glenmont, Friendship Village, and Rossmoor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
